cv.subtitle: Systems and IT Security Administrator
cv.profile.title: Professional Profile
cv.profile.description: I have more than five years of experience as an IT Systems Administrator, specialized in IT security and IT infrastructure management. My focus is on ensuring the integrity and resilience of networks and systems, implementing proactive solutions for data protection and performance optimization. Throughout my career, I have improved my skills in advanced tools and applications such as Nmap, Sonicwall and Metasploit, strengthening IT security and threat response capabilities. Currently, I am attending a programming course, expanding my competences to develop more efficient and versatile solutions in IT environments.
cv.experience.title: Work Experience
cv.experience.duties.3: Network and server configuration and maintenance
cv.experience.duties.6: Handling of tools: Sonicwall, Acronis, Veeam, etc.

about.desc: Professional in computer systems administration, networking and programming, with extensive experience in technical support and technology. Characterized by a practical and direct approach, solving problems with efficiency and innovation.
about.desc2: Always keeping a curious and skeptical mentality, looking for effective solutions without detours. In every project I work on I value clarity, originality and efficiency.
about.desc3: In addition, I enjoy an intelligent and agile good humor, always in an environment of respect and professionalism.
about.desc4: If you are looking for someone with conviction, creativity and technical approach, I am up for the challenge!
education.title: Formación
education.description:
Welcome to the platform on which you will find all the contents of the Object-Oriented Programming and Databases course, including the theory, exercises and assignments.
Includes exercises and projects developed in Python, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Practical material worked on in MySQL and Linux and Windows operating systems.
education.python.title: Python
education.python.basics.title: Basic Concepts
education.python.basics.description:
Python is a high-level, interpreted, object-oriented programming language. It is known for its clear and readable syntax, making it easy to learn and use. Python is versatile and used in a wide range of applications, from web development to data analysis and machine learning.
This section explains the basic programming concepts.
education.python.practices.title: Exercises
education.python.practices.description: This section presents practical exercises to apply the concepts learned in the theory. The exercises are designed to reinforce knowledge and improve Python programming skills.
education.web.title: Web Development
education.web.html.title: Basic HTML/CSS Concepts
education.web.html.description: HTML (HyperText Markup Language) is the standard markup language for creating web pages. It is used to structure content and define the presentation of elements on a page. CSS (Cascading Style Sheets) is used alongside HTML to apply styles and design to web pages, allowing more precise control over their visual appearance.
education.web.html.practices.title: HTML/CSS Exercises
education.web.html.practices.description: This section presents practical exercises to apply the concepts learned in HTML and CSS theory. The exercises are designed to reinforce knowledge and improve web development skills.
education.web.js.title: JavaScript
education.web.js.description: JavaScript is an interpreted, object-oriented programming language widely used in web development. It enables interactivity and dynamic behavior in web pages, enhancing user experience. JavaScript runs in the client's browser and can interact with HTML and CSS to modify content and style in real time.
education.web.js.practices.title: JavaScript Exercises
education.web.js.practices.description: This section presents practical exercises to apply the concepts learned in JavaScript theory. The exercises are designed to reinforce knowledge and improve programming skills in JavaScript.
